channel.description: This chapter covers the following exam topics: 5.0 Security Fundamentals 5.1 Define key security concepts (threats, vulnerabilities, exploits, and mitigation techniques) 5.2 Describe security program elements (user awareness, training, and physical access control) 5.4 Describe security password policies elements, such as management, complexity, and password alternatives (multifactor authentication, certificates, and biometrics) 5.8 Differentiate authentication, authorization, and accounting concepts Attacks That Spoof Addresses attacker sends packets with a spoofed source IP address
